usrs: (`USER_ID` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `REG_DATE` varchar(13) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ALIAS` varchar(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `GENDER` varchar(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ROLE` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `SCONES` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `TMP_TEXT` text, `B_POINT` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `HAS_PENDING` varchar(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1', `CURR_ACTIVITY` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `LAST_ACTIVITY` varchar(13) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`USER_ID`) )
incarichi: (`ID` varchar(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `TITLE` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `DIFFICULTY` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `AUTHOR_ID` int(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`))
